explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a white shirt and dark jeans is lying on a sofa bed. He faces the left side, with his right hand behind his head and his left hand on his knee. His knees are bent forward. Underneath him is a brown blanket with a floral sheet underneath. White and red pillows are placed behind him. An Ultraman toy is beside him. Behind the sofa bed is a white wall with a decorative painting.

[0-7] Then the pattern on the brown blanket begins to change, appearing like a surge of water gradually flooding the bed. The man raises his hand to rub his eyes, tries to touch the water flow with his hand, and sits up to look at the bed.
